name: mtsg
title: St. Jude Mutational Signatures
summary: Find and quantify COSMIC mutational signatures across samples

inputSpec.name: vcfs
inputSpec.label: VCF(s)
inputSpec.help: Input VCFs. Can be single-sample or multi-sample and uncompressed or gzipped.

inputSpec.name: sample_sheet
inputSpec.label: Sample sheet
inputSpec.help: Tab-delimited file containing sample ID and tag pairs

inputSpec.name: genome_build
inputSpec.label: Genome build
inputSpec.help: Genome build the input uses as reference

inputSpec.name: min_burden
inputSpec.label: Minimum mutation burden
inputSpec.help: Minimum number of somatic SNVs a sample must have to be considered

inputSpec.name: min_contribution
inputSpec.label: Minimum signature contribution
inputSpec.help: Minimum number of mutations attributable to a single signature

inputSpec.name: prefix
inputSpec.label: Output prefix
inputSpec.help: Prefix to prepend to output filenames

inputSpec.name: disable_column
inputSpec.label: Disabled VCF column
inputSpec.help: VCF column index to ignore (starting from sample names, zero-based)

outputSpec.name: signatures_txt
outputSpec.label: Raw signatures
outputSpec.help: Tab-delimited file of the raw results with sample contributions for each signature

outputSpec.name: sample_sheet_out
outputSpec.label: Sample sheet
outputSpec.help: Tab-delimited file containing sample ID and tag pairs
